Summary: bright light in nw sky - stationary - thought it was a bright star
divs: sighting detailsmy dog was out on the deck and started barking so i went out. looked up in the sky (just about northwest) and saw a bright light - thought it was a plane but it didn't move. so i thought it was just a bright star, but considering there's a 3\4 moon, this was pretty bright. i watched for 3-5 minutes and it just stayed in one spot. it seemd too big for a star but small of anything else, unless it was far away. went inside and about 20-30 min later went out again and it was gone. been out for last 1 1\2 hours and nothing else. just wanted to report it in case someone has seen anything.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Binghamton
There were no other sightings in Binghamton on or around May 24th 2010
